attributes.action: Remove Sadiq Khan from the new years honours list and remove his knighthood.
attributes.additional_details: Remove him from the New years honours and remove his knighthood it is not deserved.
attributes.background: Sadiq Khan as London mayor has continued to ignore the people of London riding roughshod over Londoners, he does not deserve any recognition for his poor management.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions that relate to honours and appointments, which includes calling for an honour to be removed.
